org.jcvi.jillion.core.util

Interface GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder

  • Enclosing class:
    GenomeStatistics

    public static interface GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder
    Interface for computing a Genome Statistic using the Builder pattern which allows you to delay adding elements to include in the computation instead of requiring them all at once.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder add(int length)
      Add a single length to the computation.
      GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder add(long length)
      Convenience method for adding a length that is of type long.
      OptionalInt build()
      Compute the genome statistic.
      GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder merge(GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder other)
      Combine the lengths of GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilders into a single list of lengths.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder add(int length)
        Add a single length to the computation.
        Parameters:
        length - the length to add must be >0.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if length is negative.

      • add

        GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder add(long length)
        Convenience method for adding a length that is of type long. The value must still be between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        API Note:
        this method exists because many Jillion objects return longs.
        Implementation Requirements:
        after checking to make sure length fits inside an int, this method just delegates to add((int)) length) casting the length to an int.
        Parameters:
        length - the length to add must be >0 and <= Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if length is negative or > Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • merge

        GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder merge(GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder other)
        Combine the lengths of GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilders into a single list of lengths. This is used by the collector implementations and probably should not be called directly.
        Parameters:
        other - the other GenomeStatistics.GenomeStatisticsBuilder whose lengths are to be merged into this builder; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if other is null.

      • build

        OptionalInt build()
        Compute the genome statistic.
        Returns:
        an OptionalInt which either has a value, or is empty if there was an error computing it.
